video.title: Better Off Ted
video.synopsis: Ted, a single dad working at a soulless conglomerate, tries to balance his own code of ethics with the odd and immoral assignments he must carry out.

episodes.synopsis: In this satirical office comedy, Ted is a morally conscious man who runs an R&D department at a morally questionable corporation.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Ted's top scientists try to grow cow-less meat in the lab. Veronica worries that Phil will try to sue Veridian for cryogenically freezing him.
episodes.title: Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Ted brings his daughter, Rose, to work, where she impacts his co-workers; Phil and Lem battle to be in charge; Ted's feelings for Linda take a turn.
episodes.title: Through Rose Colored HAZMAT Suits

episodes.synopsis: Veridian's new controversial sensor system fails to recognize African-American employees. Linda is upset that Ted gets along with her new boyfriend.
episodes.title: Racial Sensitivity

episodes.synopsis: Phil and Lem accidentally dose Linda with an experimental energy drug, and Ted and Veronica compete to sell the most gift wrap.
episodes.title: Win Some, Dose Some

episodes.synopsis: The gang resorts to desperate measures to help Ted get his job back after he is deleted from Veridian's computer system.
episodes.title: Goodbye, Mr. Chips

episodes.synopsis: Ted and Veronica try fixing things when a survey reveals that Veridian employees are miserable.
episodes.title: Get Happy

episodes.synopsis: Phil and Lem are upset when Ted excels as a member of the Medieval Fight Club. Linda tries to befriend Veronica but finds her efforts are one-sided.
episodes.title: You Are the Boss of Me

episodes.synopsis: A biohazard forces Ted to share office space with both Veronica and Linda. And Lem asks a pretty scientist out on a date.
episodes.title: Bioshuffle

episodes.synopsis: Veridian is sued after a product mishap, and Veronica wants Linda to take the blame. A deposition reveals that Phil has been lying to Lem for years.
episodes.title: Trust and Consequence

episodes.synopsis: Veronica's relationship with her father takes an uncomfortable turn. Ted wants to impress his father when Lem and Phil find a cure for baldness.
episodes.title: Father, Can You Hair Me?

episodes.synopsis: Ted creates a fictitious project to please Linda but then must create another imaginary project to justify the expenditures to Veronica.
episodes.title: Jabberwocky

episodes.synopsis: When Veridian employees discover Veronica's love life, she leaves the man she loves rather than invite ridicule. Linda denies her feelings for Ted.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lives

episodes.synopsis: Veridian tries to match employees based on their genetic compatibility. Linda and Ted find themselves instantly attracted to their supposed matches.
episodes.title: Love Blurts

episodes.synopsis: Layoffs hit Veridian, and little Rose seems to have info that Veronica wants despite Ted's disapproval. Linda is elated to sell her children's book.
episodes.title: The Lawyer, The Lemur & The Little Listener

episodes.synopsis: Lem flips out when his mother comes to visit. Ted gets miffed when Linda gets all the credit after she makes a suggestion about his prize project.
episodes.title: Battle of the Bulbs

episodes.synopsis: When Veronica's boyfriend comes to town, she starts slacking off at work. Ted tries to get her back on track. Lem is given a bright red lab coat.
episodes.title: It's Nothing Business, It's Just Personal

episodes.synopsis: Oddball Sheila falsely accuses Ted and Linda of sexual harassment. Veronica convinces Veridian to classify sexual harassment as a disease.
episodes.title: The Great Repression

episodes.synopsis: After an employee drops dead in the midst of Veridian's push to finish a project, Veronica tries to use the incident to make the staff work harder.
episodes.title: Beating a Dead Workforce

episodes.synopsis: Ted struggles with a talkative security guard who wants to be his friend. A terrified Phil and Lem face the prospect of working alone with Veronica.
episodes.title: Change We Can't Believe In

episodes.synopsis: A typo in a memo about inappropriate behavior orders employees to engage in offensive language. Ted tries to convince the company to fix the error.
episodes.title: The Impertence of Communicationizing

episodes.synopsis: Ted insists on taking the high road after his nemesis at work comes up with almost the exact same project that Ted's team has been working on.
episodes.title: The Long and Winding High Road

episodes.synopsis: Ted romances a German executive who can't speak English. Veridian is developing a translation device, but the voice of the device is Phil's.
episodes.title: Lust in Translation

episodes.synopsis: Ted helps his brother get a job selling lab equipment for a Veridian supplier, but he sells Veridian more equipment than they could ever use.
episodes.title: Mess of a Salesman

episodes.synopsis: When the boss invites Ted and his daughter on a playdate with him and his daughter, Veronica accuses Ted of using Rose to advance his career.
episodes.title: It's My Party and I'll Lie if I Want To

episodes.synopsis: Veridian wants to increase employee productivity, so Ted tells the staff that those who work hard will get tickets that they can redeem for prizes.
episodes.title: Swag the Dog
